generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Connection Rule
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Defines whether other blocks such as fences, walls, bars, and glass panes are allowed to connect to this block.

fields.title: Connection Type
fields.description: The type of block allowed to connect to this block. Note that the "only_fences" option allows connections from all Vanilla fences excluding NetherBrick.

fields.title: Enabled Directions
fields.description: The cardinal directions that connection is enabled for. Note that if "none" is specified for "accepts_connections_from", this field will not be used.
